name: DISC_SPECIFIC_INFO
description: This table contains specific information for disciplines.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the goal record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SMARTTEXT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the SmartText (ETX) used to document on this goal.

columns.name: SMARTTEXT_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: DISCIPLINES_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the most current Discipline (LDS) for the goal.

columns.name: DISCIPLINES_ID_DISC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the discipline record.

columns.name: HH_GOAL_DISC_C_NAME
columns.description: The current Home Health disciplines linked to the goal.

columns.name: HH_DISCIPLINE_START_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the effective date of a Home Health goal discipline which is added after the goal record is created.
